title: Strictly's AJ Pritchard enjoyed 'secret fling' with ex contestant Daisy Lowe
text:
Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly Come Dancing star AJ Pritchard enjoyed a 'secret fling' with contestant Daisy Lowe , it has been claimed.

The pair met back in 2016 when model Daisy was partnered with Aljaz Skorjanec on the show.

Daisy, 30, is said to have fallen for heartthrob AJ after splitting from her boyfriend at the time. Although unlike most Strictly romances, her 'fling' with AJ was kept well under wraps, according to a show insider.

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

The source told The Sun: "They've never discussed it publicly but it's gone down in Strictly folklore among the crew.

"Over the years lots of Strictly stars have grown close and it usually comes out straight away.

"AJ and Daisy really hit off when they were both on the show even though they weren't dancing together."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: REX)

A representative for Daisy, who is now dating singer Jack Penate, has denied the claims.

It's not the first time AJ has been linked to celebrity contestants on the show.

In 2017 he was rumoured to be dating his partner Mollie King, a relationship they both denied.

While this year he's was linked to partner Saffron Barker after they were seen getting close in rehearsals.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: aj11ace/Instagram)

AJ is dating dancer Abbie Quinnen who he went public with during a holiday to Greece over the summer.

He was later pictured on a double date with Abbie and his brother Curtis Pritchard and his Love Island 'girlfriend' Maura Higgins.

AJ said that as a fellow dancer Abbie was not concerned about the so-called 'Strictly curse' and understood that he would be getting close - in a professional sense - to whoever he was partnered with.

Speaking on Good Morning Britain, he said: "My girlfriend Abbie, she's a dancer as well.

“She goes away and does her dancing she understands the long hours and hard work.

“We always want the dance on Saturday to be the best dance possible. She’s not worried at all.”
description: A show insider claimed the brief fling has 'gone down in Strictly folklore'
